## Properties

| Property  | Attribute  | Description                                                     | Type     | Default |
| --------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `dueTime` | `due-time` | Amount of time in ms the onCountChange event will be debounced. | `number` | `250`   |
